snippet: Jeff Rose, a managing director in the mergers group focused on consumer and retail at Bank of America Merrill Lynch, will join Deutsche Bank as head of its consumer and retail investment banking coverage in the Americas.
abstract: Jeff Rose, a managing director in the mergers group focused on consumer and retail at Bank of America Merrill Lynch, will join Deutsche Bank as head of its consumer and retail investment banking coverage in the Americas.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Hires Consumer M.&A. Adviser
